name: Ampharos
author: Hajime Kusajima
flavor_text: The tip of its tail shines brightly. In the olden days, people sent signals using the tail’s light.

abilities.name: Electromagnetic Wall
abilities.effect: As long as this Pokémon is your Active Pokémon, whenever your opponent attaches an Energy from his or her hand to 1 of his or her Pokémon, put 3 damage counters on that Pokémon.

attacks.name: Electrobullet
attacks.effect: Does 20 damage to 1 of your opponent’s Benched Pokémon. (Don’t apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)
